I would go to the moon first. The moon has always fascinated me, and I would love to experience the feeling of weightlessness and the surreal landscape.
I would go to a remote island in the middle of the ocean. I've always been drawn to the idea of isolation and the peacefulness of being surrounded by nature.
I would go to the bottom of the ocean. I've always been curious about the world beneath the waves and the creatures that live there.
I would go to the top of the tallest mountain. I've always been fascinated by the view from the top and the feeling of being so close to the clouds.
I would go to a different galaxy. I've always been interested in space and the idea of traveling to another galaxy would be a dream come true.
